name: Spicy Ketchup
keywords: pepper, raisins, tomato puree, vegan, vegetarian, winter
recipeIngredient: 3/4 teaspoon Aleppo pepper (see note) or cayenne pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the raisins in a small cup, cover with boiling water and let soak for 20 minutes. Drain the raisins and place them in the container of a blender. Add all the remaining ingredients and blend until smooth.
Transfer the mixture to a small saucepan and simmer until thickened, about 20 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature with ijeh.
